message.default: Your account has been successfully verified

401.description: Unauthorized - incorrect API key or incorrect format

403.description: Permission Denied. You do not have the rights to access this request

404.description: Not found - the request Data was not found

408.description: The request timed out. Please try again

schema.error: The request timed out. Please try again

410.description: The requested data is not available

500.description: A problem has occurred. Sorry for inconvenience
